thread.section_title: The Marmara Manhattan - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: REAL FIND & VALUE ON THE UPPER EAST SIDE
thread.title_full: REAL FIND & VALUE ON THE UPPER EAST SIDE - Review of The Marmara Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Barrett R
title: REAL FIND & VALUE ON THE UPPER EAST SIDE
text: Former condo, now hotel. All apartments-- not just suites. Full kitchens, LR, plenty of closets and living space. Staff helpful and friendly. Good location, esp. now with subway entrance just outside their door. Good for short or longer stays and fairly priced.
